entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
